long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SeemlessFocus is a powerful Google Chrome extension that connects seamlessly with the Spotify API, allowing you to access and control your Spotify account right from your browser. Whether you’re working on a project, studying for exams, or just need a distraction-free environment, SeemlessFocus keeps your Spotify music within easy reach, so you can stay focused and motivated without breaking your concentration.
